## Part2 R section

R script that prints all integers between 1 and 10 (including 1 and 10) to screen. Here is one of the multiple ways to implement this function. It's more like a pythonic way since I prefer coding in python.

```{r integers between 1 and 10}
for (i in 1:10){
  print(i)
}
```
